title: How to write a letter asking for night classes - Quora

response.answer_text: To The Principal, School Name, City Subject: Request for night classes Sir, I am a student of (your class) and the reason why I am writing this application is that our syllabus is not covered and the exams are in the next [number of mouth] month . I request you to arrange night classes for the respective syllabus so that we can complete the full syllabus before exams. Thanking you, Yours faithfully, Your Name Your Class Your Roll Date

the general structure of a letter is the same, but id encourage seeking the counsel of the departments head. i had a similar issue while in my third year. the dean of student provided me with the insights to maintain. Besides, it is a very simple procedure.
